entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Colborne 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 3.9°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
